This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddSafeContentsEncrypted (System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeContents safeContents, byte[] passwordBytes, System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters pbeParameters);

.method public hidebysig instance void AddSafeContentsEncrypted(class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeContents safeContents, unsigned int8[] passwordBytes, class System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters pbeParameters) cil managed
Public Sub AddSafeContentsEncrypted (safeContents As Pkcs12SafeContents, passwordBytes As Byte(), pbeParameters As PbeParameters)

public: void AddSafeContentsEncrypted(System::Security::Cryptography::Pkcs::Pkcs12SafeContents ^ safeContents, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ passwordBytes, System::Security::Cryptography::PbeParameters ^ pbeParameters);
member this.AddSafeContentsEncrypted : System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeContents * byte[] * System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters -> unit
public void AddSafeContentsEncrypted (System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeContents safeContents, byte[]? passwordBytes, System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters pbeParameters);

param.name: safeContents
param.span: 要添加到 PFX 的内容。

span.span: The contents to add to the PFX.

param.name: passwordBytes
param.span: 加密内容时用作密码的字节数组。

span.span: The byte array to use as a password when encrypting the contents.

param.name: pbeParameters
param.span: 加密内容时使用的基于密码加密 (PBE) 参数。

span.span: The password-based encryption (PBE) parameters to use when encrypting the contents.

summary.span: 将内容添加到使用字节数组中基于字节的密码加密的捆绑包中的 PFX。

span.span: Add contents to the PFX in an bundle encrypted with a byte-based password from a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到密钥派生函数 (KDF) 使用的算法所使用的算法 `pbeParameters` 。The password bytes are passed directly into the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used by the algorithm indicated by `pbeParameters`. 这样，在使用 PBKDF2 处理密码时，与使用 UTF-8 以外的文本编码的其他系统兼容， (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 。This enables compatibility with other systems which use a text encoding other than UTF-8 when processing passwords with PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2). 的内容在 `safeContents` 调用此方法时读取，并在内部存储为加密内容。The contents of `safeContents` are read during the call to this method, encrypted, and stored internally as encrypted content. 在 此方法调用之后对或任何其引用所做的任何更改都不会在最终输出中反映出来。Any changes to the or any it references made after this method call are not reflected in the final output.

span.span: The or parameter is .
The parameter value is already encrypted.
The PFX is already sealed ( is ).

exception.span: 指示应使用需要基于 密码的 。

span.span: indicates that should be used, which requires -based passwords.

span.span: Add contents to the PFX in an bundle encrypted with a char-based password from a span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `pbeParameters` 指示使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 的算法时，密码将通过 utf-8 编码转换为字节。When `pbeParameters` indicates an algorithm that uses PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding. 的内容在 `safeContents` 调用此方法时读取，并在内部存储为加密内容。The contents of `safeContents` are read during the call to this method, encrypted, and stored internally as encrypted content. 在 此方法调用之后对或任何其引用所做的任何更改都不会在最终输出中反映出来。Any changes to the or any it references made after this method call are not reflected in the final output.

span.span: The or parameter is .
The parameter value is already encrypted.
The PFX is already sealed ( is ).

summary.span: 在不加密的情况下将内容添加到 PFX。

span.span: Add contents to the PFX without encrypting them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `safeContents` 值已加密，则此方法会将其按原样添加到 PFX。If the `safeContents` value is already encrypted, this method adds it to the PFX as-is. 的内容在 `safeContents` 调用此方法期间读取，并在内部存储为其内容的编码形式。The contents of `safeContents` are read during the call to this method, and stored internally as the encoded form of their content. 在 此方法调用之后对或任何其引用所做的任何更改都不会在最终输出中反映出来。Any changes to the or any it references made after this method call are not reflected in the final output.

The PFX is already sealed ( is ).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SealWithMac (ReadOnlySpan<char> password, System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, int iterationCount);

.method public hidebysig instance void SealWithMac(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> password, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, int32 iterationCount) cil managed
Public Sub SealWithMac (password As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char), hashAlgorithm As HashAlgorithmName, iterationCount As Integer)

member this.SealWithMac : ReadOnlySpan<char> * System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName * int -> unit

param.name: password
param.span: 用作计算 MAC 的密钥的密码。

span.span: The password to use as a key for computing the MAC.

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.span: 计算 MAC 时要使用的哈希算法。

span.span: The hash algorithm to use when computing the MAC.

param.name: iterationCount
param.span: 用于计算 MAC 的密钥派生函数 (KDF) 的迭代计数。

span.span: The iteration count for the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used in computing the MAC.

summary.span: 密封 PFX 以防止进一步的更改，方法是使用范围中的密码将基于密码的消息验证代码 (MAC) 应用于内容。

span.span: Seals the PFX against further changes by applying a password-based Message Authentication Code (MAC) over the contents with a password from a span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接受的任何哈希算法都可以由类进行处理 。Any hash algorithm that this method accepts can be processed by the class. 哈希算法的某些选择可能会导致 或 某些操作系统发生故障，因为这些方法依赖于系统库来提供支持。Some choices of hash algorithm may cause failures in or on some operating systems, because these methods depend on system libraries for support. 通过 as PKCS # 12 PFX 导出时，在 Windows 7 的全新安装上使用的哈希算法的 迭代次数为2000。The hash algorithm used on a fresh installation of Windows 7 when exporting via as a PKCS#12 PFX is with an iteration count of 2000. 由于 SHA1 出现冲突，Microsoft 建议基于 SHA256 或更好的安全模型;但是，某些 PFX 读取器可能只支持 SHA1。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better; however, some PFX readers may only support SHA1.

span.span: The parameter is less than or equal to 0.
The PFX is already sealed ( is ).

summary.span: 密封 PFX 以防止进一步的更改，方法是使用字符串中的密码将基于密码的消息验证代码 (MAC) 应用于内容。

span.span: Seals the PFX against further changes by applying a password-based Message Authentication Code (MAC) over the contents with a password from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接受的任何哈希算法都可以由类进行处理 。Any hash algorithm that this method accepts can be processed by the class. 哈希算法的某些选择可能会导致 或 某些操作系统发生故障，因为这些方法依赖于系统库来提供支持。Some choices of hash algorithm may cause failures in or on some operating systems, because these methods depend on system libraries for support. 通过 as PKCS # 12 PFX 导出时，在 Windows 7 的全新安装上使用的哈希算法的 迭代次数为2000。The hash algorithm used on a fresh installation of Windows 7 when exporting via as a PKCS#12 PFX is with an iteration count of 2000. 由于 SHA1 出现冲突，Microsoft 建议基于 SHA256 或更好的安全模型;但是，某些 PFX 读取器可能只支持 SHA1。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better; however, some PFX readers may only support SHA1.

The PFX is already sealed ( is ).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SealWithoutIntegrity ();
.method public hidebysig instance void SealWithoutIntegrity() cil managed
Public Sub SealWithoutIntegrity ()
public: void SealWithoutIntegrity();
member this.SealWithoutIntegrity : unit -> unit

summary.span: 密封 PFX 以防止进一步的更改，无需应用防篡改。

span.span: Seals the PFX from further changes without applying tamper-protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与 PKCS # 12 规范兼容，但不建议将其用于测试以外的目的。This method exists for compatibility with the PKCS#12 specification, but its use is not recommended for purposes other than testing. 生成可由的重载使用 或 不接受密码参数的 PFX 时，请将 方法用作 密码。When building a PFX that can be used by the overloads of or which do not accept a password parameter, use the method with as the password.

span.span: The PFX is already sealed ( is ).
